name: Submission
overview: Submission is a platformer in the style of Montezuma's Revenge; the player character can move, jump, or climb (ladders) and has to avoid many obstacles and creatures to collect treasures and reach the end of the level. Most items you see will kill you, of particular note there are vertical stripes that will appear/disappear in the players path, and you must time running through them as they will kill you if they appear while you are standing in their spot.
